content: electric blue hat is a perfect project for cable lovers is very funny to knit and it s done in one day it`s knitted with circular needles and has a double brim for extra warmth on cold winter days is a one-size hat that should be sufficiently stretchy to fit different size woman s heads guage 9 sts x 12 row = 2 in stockinette materials two skeins of any yarn for needle size 5 00 mm one size us 7 / 4 5 mm circular needle one size us 8 / 5 0 mm circular needle cabling needle follow me on instagram https //www instagram com/meetmyknit_design/ enjoy the knitting
